name: Europa Universalis III: In Nomine
description:
Europa Universalis III: In Nomine is a strategy game developed by Paradox Interactive. It was originally released in 2008. Paradox Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Europa Universalis III: In Nomine is available on PC.
Johan Andersson produced the game. Andreas Waldetoft scored the game.
